description:
Exit when reboot detected

When installing / upgrading these packages, I would like to advise you to enable this feature `choco feature enable -n=exitOnRebootDetected`

## Quick and easy granular recovery for Teams

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
displayName: Veeam Explorer for Microsoft Teams for Microsoft 365
summary: Veeam Backup explorer for Microsoft Teams m365 edition
author: Veeam Software Group GmbH
